title: The Matrix
tagline: In a world where Keanu Reeves knows kungfu, he's gonna need all the kungfu to defeat a planet of robots
description: Some programmer discovers his world is far from ordinary. In fact, it's extraordinary. Some might say it's unbelievable. We've all seen this movie.

actors.fullName: The Guy From Lord of the Rings

title: Pulp Fiction
tagline: I don't even know how to summarize this film. Heroin, Dancing, Die Hard era Bruce Willis?
description: Quentin Tarantino may be insufferable, but his movies sure aren't. This movie is a roller coaster of non stop coolness and gangsters eating hamburgers. Wait, you haven't seen this movie yet? Dude, it's on Netflix go watch it right now.
